item.description:
Hello all,

Walk the Board On Upper Broadway In Norwich

 

Last minute RSVP's can Call 8608876508


Bring your favorite Game Night

March 31 5pm till whenever

I have Changed the RSVP to 24, Gring a last minute guest is always good!
I will provide soda, snacks and Dinner. I have a bottle of wine and maybe some micro brew’s , if you wish to share or drink something else , bring what you like. If you would like to bring other food items to share with the group, please let me know so I can plan my menu.

Address is 242 Broadway Norwich 1st floor front of the house.
Parking either on street or back of the house is a church parking lot upper level and walk around the fence.

Remember to include a $1.00 for Nina.
item.how_to_find_us: 242 Broadway Norwich 1st floor front of the house.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Walk the Board On Upper Broadway In Norwich - Bring your favorite game.
